articles.title: Uganda enacts harsh anti-LGBTQ law including death penalty - Reuters
articles.description: Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni has signed one of the world's toughest anti-LGBTQ laws, including the death penalty for "aggravated homosexuality", in…
articles.content: KAMPALA, May 29 (Reuters) - Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni has signed one of the world's toughest anti-LGBTQ laws, including the death penalty for "aggravated homosexuality", in defiance of Weste… [+4004 chars]
